name: TipsyTest
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tipsy test
des:
House party? Pregame? Casual drink? Use Tipsy Test to calculate your Blood Alcoholic Concentration level! 

The Alexa Skill Safe to Drive gives you an estimate of your blood alcohol content (BAC), using the Widmark formula.

When your blood alcohol content (BAC) is at 0.08% or higher, you’re considered legally impaired in the U.S, and are by law not permitted to drive. If you're under 21 it is illegal to consume any alcohol.

 *** Disclaimer*** This skill only provides an estimate. It is always safer to drive completely sober. Different size containers of alcohol, or ABV (alcohol by volume) may skew results.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
